attributes.review: I am absolutely dumbfounded by how awful this app is. I was on it one night and all of a sudden a large orange idiot came out from my phone and started spewing hot garbage all over my floor. The idiot didn’t even have the decency to clean up after he was done. Now my carpet is ruined I expect to be reimbursed in full for damages.
attributes.title: This app ruined my carpet

attributes.review: The only reason he probably made this app is because he probably knew he wasn’t going to win this year and he’s not... he is racist, rude, and very unprofessional and he does not deserve to be the president of the United States again... he will tear this whole country apart and make it worse than it already is.😡🤬✊🏽👿
attributes.title: Donald trump is terrible

attributes.review: This app has changed my life. For the worse. A big orange dot keeps appearing on my screen every time I open the app. It’s won’t go away. I think there needs to be a software change to get rid of this problem. Because when I close the app it goes away. Please consider.
attributes.title: Fake news

attributes.review: after waiting A WHOLE YEAR it finally downloaded. it took 365 days to download and that is unacceptable. to make matters worse when i finally opened the app the only thing on my screen was a pig. i couldn’t get the app to work. i waited for this garbage to load but the app is just the worst
attributes.title: Unbelievable

attributes.review: This app not only looks like it was made up by some highschool people Doing a project for media but they racist president is obviously all about him self .  This app is useless and takes up space for what two upcoming events why? No need to make a app cuz no one is gonna show up to his events like last time :)
attributes.title: Just no ❤️✨

attributes.review: they said that they would kill my and the put me on fire and then eat me for freaking dinner ugh please don’t download i deleted it right away so so so scary and they tried to kill my whole family too even my kids and parents please don’t download i cried all night long don’t download if you give it a 1 star it will get deleted so please do it and also tiktok will get deleted if you don’t please delete it thanks for protecting me god but he can’t get to all of us so delete the app and give it 1 star now
attributes.title: don’t download unless you want to get burned alive

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and the second I opened it my hamster got possessed by some demon, he flew up and out the wall. It took us 3 hours to try and find him when we did we put him in his cage and called the exsersis. Long story short he ate him. Now we’re just waiting for the police to pick him up, so UNDER ANY sercomstances DO NOT get this app

This app is not only extremely glitchy but it has made my phone crash so many times to the point where I had to get a new iPhone because I got several viruses, please delete this app from the App Store to prevent other people from losing their phones.
attributes.title: Absolutely terrible

attributes.review: This app is horrible it took FOREVER to download like two, three hours.🤚🏽✨ Once it finally opened it was this plank white screen✴️😗So I closed the app and went on Safari too do research on the app and all that popped up was a nude picture of guess who ! 😶✨ THE RAPIST- I mean PRESIDENT himself 😐👄Anyways this app gets a 1 star I would give it a zero but I can’t . ✨🎶
attributes.title: ✨🤍MY PHONE HAS BEEN HACKED BY A CHETO✨🤍

attributes.review: How do you do update but the app is still absolutely terrible. While using this app my phone completely bugged out, I had to restart it and re-download the app. Once I did that my phone was still glitchy. If I could rate 0 I would. 0/10 definitely would not recommend
attributes.title: Awful
